resources.string: Select who the group has decided to vote off:

A minimum of 5 players and a maximum of 15 is required to play.

One player will be assigned Mafia. Their goal is to kill all of the other players off without being caught.

Another player will be marked as Doctor. They are able to revive someone who has been killed by the Mafia, provided that they choose the correct person.

Another player will be assigned the Detective role. They may inspect one person per round and find out their role.

All other players will be assigned the Civilian role, and will leave their fate in the hands of either the Mafia or the Doctor.

After a night is over, the Detective, Doctor, and Civilians will deliberate and vote someone off (or skip the vote if there is not enough evidence).

Keep in mind that the Detective's ability is vital for the voting period, so choose wisely!

If the Mafia takes out enough people to leave only 1 civilian remaining, then Mafia wins. If the others figure out who the Mafia is before then and vote them off, Civilians win instead!
